ygData.subject: Re: Civil War
ygData.msgSnippet: Allright, I just did read back on every post that had Tarantulas in it, and there isn t anything about him getting the codes. If you can show me one where

Allright, I just did read back on every post that had 'Tarantulas' in 
it, and there isn't anything about him getting the codes. If you can 
show me one where there is, I'll admit I'm wrong, until then, this is 
on pause with the lockdown activated.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, JP3884@a... wrote:
> Yan, read some back posts, Tarantulas TOOK the codes before you 
decided to 
> take over. Sorry man.
> 
>        "With the exhaust filling the Corridors, we wont have to 
worry about 
> them getting in here. Now, Tarantulas, get control of the internal 
defences. 
> They have the Autoguns, so I want the shields." Megatron said, 
leaning over 
> his shoulder and looking into the computer monitor.
> 
>        Aracnia saw it first, then Gremlin, the exhaust. Together 
they ran as 
> fast as they could. Ahead of them they saw the double doors they 
needed to 
> get into, and with the crossfire of the Autoguns and gas, it was 
making it 
> rather hard. "Quick!" Gremlin yelled, grasping the middle of the 
doors and 
> forcing them open.
>        She rolled in and then pulled him in. Behinde them, the 
doors snapped 
> shut. They coucged hard and looked at their arms. It was tarnished 
from the 
> gas. 
>        "Alright, now what, cough coucgh." Gremlin said.
>        "We go down." Aracnia said, and looking down she kicked a 
panle of the 
> elevators floor down. Beneath it was a long dark shaft, slowly 
filling with 
> the green gas. Slowly.
>        Taking some web, she tied it to the ceiling above, and 
repelled down 
> the shaft, followed by Gremlin.
